title: Breaking: Celebrity found alive after rumors of death
text: The celebrity was seen at a public event, confirming they are alive and well.

title: Government confirms new tax reforms starting next month

title: Scientists discover cure for common cold overnight
text: A viral article claims scientists created a miracle drug overnight.

title: Sports team wins championship after 20 years
